insults.insultText: You fight like a dairy Farmer!
insults.counterText: How appropriate. You fight like a cow!

insults.insultText: This is the END for you, you gutter crawling cur!
insults.counterText: And I've got a little TIP for you, get the POINT?

insults.insultText: I've spoken with apes more polite than you!
insults.counterText: I'm glad to hear you attended your family reunion!

insults.insultText: Soon you'll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
insults.counterText: First you'd better stop waving it like a feather duster.

insults.insultText: People fall at my feet when they see me coming!
insults.counterText: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

insults.insultText: I'm not going to take your insolence sitting down!
insults.counterText: Your hemorrhoids are flaring up again eh?

insults.insultText: I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
insults.counterText: He must have taught you everything you know.

insults.insultText: Nobody's ever drawn blood from me and nobody ever will.
insults.counterText: You run THAT fast?

insults.insultText: Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
insults.counterText: Why? Did you want to borrow one?

insults.insultText: There are no words for how disgusting you are.
insults.counterText: Yes, there are. You just never learned them.

insults.insultText: You make me want to puke.
insults.counterText: You make me think somebody already did.

insults.insultText: My handkerchief will wipe up your blood!
insults.counterText: So you got that job as janitor, after all.

insults.insultText: I got this scar on my face during a mighty struggle!
insults.counterText: I hope now you've learned to stop picking your nose.

insults.insultText: I've heard you are a contemptible sneak.
insults.counterText: Too bad no one's ever heard of YOU at all.

insults.insultText: You're no match for my brains, you poor fool.
insults.counterText: I'd be in real trouble if you ever used them.

insults.insultText: You have the manners of a beggar.
insults.counterText: I wanted to make sure you'd feel comfortable with me.

insults.insultText: Now I know what filth and stupidity really are.
insults.counterText: I'm glad to hear you attended your family reunion.

insults.insultText: Every word you say to me is stupid.
insults.counterText: I wanted to make sure you'd feel comfortable with me.

insults.insultText: I've got a long, sharp lesson for you to learn today.
insults.counterText: And I've got a little TIP for you. Get the POINT?

insults.insultText: I will milk every drop of blood from your body!
insults.counterText: How appropriate, you fight like a cow!

insults.insultText: I've got the courage and skill of a master swordsman.
insults.counterText: I'd be in real trouble if you ever used them.

insults.insultText: My tongue is sharper than any sword.
insults.counterText: First, you'd better stop waving it like a feather-duster.

insults.insultText: My name is feared in every dirty corner of this island!
insults.counterText: So you got that job as a janitor, after all.

insults.insultText: My wisest enemies run away at the first sight of me!
insults.counterText: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

insults.insultText: Only once have I met such a coward!
insults.counterText: He must have taught you everything you know.

insults.insultText: If your brother's like you, better to marry a pig.
insults.counterText: You make me think somebody already did.

insults.insultText: No one will ever catch ME fighting as badly as you do.
insults.counterText: You run THAT fast?

insults.insultText: My last fight ended with my hands covered with blood.
insults.counterText: I hope now you've learned to stop picking your nose.

insults.insultText: I hope you have a boat ready for a quick escape.
insults.counterText: Why, did you want to borrow one?

insults.insultText: My sword is famous all over the Caribbean!
insults.counterText: Too bad no one's ever heard of YOU at all.

insults.insultText: You are a pain in the backside, sir!
insults.counterText: Your hemorrhoids are flaring up again, eh?

insults.insultText: There are no clever moves that can help you now.
insults.counterText: Yes, there are. You just never learned them.
